00036  * libcfs/include/libcfs/util/ioctl.h
00037  *
00038  * Utility functions for calling ioctls.
00039  *
00040  */
00041 #ifndef _LIBCFS_IOCTL_H_
00042 #define _LIBCFS_IOCTL_H_
00043 
00044 #include <stdbool.h>
00045 #include <linux/types.h>
00046 
00047 /* Sparse annotation. */
00048 #define __user
00049 
00050 #include <libcfs/libcfs_ioctl.h>
00051 
00052 #define LIBCFS_IOC_INIT(data)                                   \
00053 do {                                                            \
00054         memset(&(data), 0, sizeof(data));                       \
00055         (data).ioc_hdr.ioc_version = LIBCFS_IOCTL_VERSION;      \
00056         (data).ioc_hdr.ioc_len = sizeof(data);                  \
00057 } while (0)
00058 
00059 #define LIBCFS_IOC_INIT_V2(data, hdr)                   \
00060 do {                                                    \
00061         memset(&(data), 0, sizeof(data));               \
00062         (data).hdr.ioc_version = LIBCFS_IOCTL_VERSION2; \
00063         (data).hdr.ioc_len = sizeof(data);              \
00064 } while (0)
00065 
00066 /* FIXME - rename these to libcfs_ */
00067 int libcfs_ioctl_pack(struct libcfs_ioctl_data *data, char **pbuf, int max);
00068 void libcfs_ioctl_unpack(struct libcfs_ioctl_data *data, char *pbuf);
00069 int register_ioc_dev(int dev_id, const char *dev_name, int major, int minor);
00070 void unregister_ioc_dev(int dev_id);
00071 int l_ioctl(int dev_id, unsigned int opc, void *buf);
00072 #endif
